searchableProductInfo.title: Paraty Small python and leather shoulder bag
searchableProductInfo.editorsNotes: Lightweight, versatile and in a pretty coral shade, Chloé's python and leather 'Paraty' bag is the perfect spring-ready update. The detachable shoulder strap is great for going hands-free, or carry it in the crook of your arm for a fashion-forward finish.Shown here with: Chloé top, bracelet and ring, Bottega Veneta belt and shoes, Mulberry shorts.
